global.name: World Wildlife Day
global.remarks: Declared by United Nations to celebrate and raise awareness of the world's wild fauna and flora.

global.name: Earth Day
global.remarks: Celebrated around the world to demonstrate support for environmental protection. First celebrated in 1970.

global.name: World Envirnoment Day
global.remarks: celebrated for encouraging awareness and action for the protection of the environment.

global.name: Earth Day
global.remarks: Celebrated around the world to demonstrate support for environmental protection. First celebrated in 1970.

local.name: Kashmir Solidarity Day
local.remarks: Protest against Indian administration in Jammu and Kashmir.

local.name: Iqbal's Death Anniversary
local.remarks: Death Anniversary of Allama Muhammad Iqbal

local.name: Pakistan Day
local.remarks: Commemorates the Lahore Resolution, which formally demanded an independent Muslim-majority state to be created out of the British Indian Empire.

local.name: Youm-e-Takbir
local.remarks: Celebrated as a national day in Pakistan on May 28 in commemoration of Chagai-I and Chagai-II Nuclear Tests.

local.name: Independence Day
local.remarks: Marking Pakistani independence from the United Kingdom, formation of Pakistan in 1947.

local.name: Defence Day
local.remarks: Army Day/Defence Day or armed forces day of Pakistan (Youm-e-Fauj/Youm-e-Difa). On this day the 1965 Indo-Pak war began.

local.name: Air Force Day
local.remarks: Air Force Day (Youm-e-Fizaia) Depend on Federal Government on this day M.M. Alam shot 5 planes in a minute in the 1965 Indo-Pak War to set a world record.

local.name: Liaqat Ali Khan's Death Anniversary
local.remarks: Death anniversary of Nawabzada Liaquat Ali Khan, widely known as Quaid-e-Millat (Leader of the Nation) and Shaheed-e-Millat and Pakistan's First Prime Minister

local.name: Quaid-e-Azam Day
local.remarks: Birthday of Muhammad Ali Jinnah, founder of Pakistan.
